name: Tech Boom
description: All miners operate 20% more efficiently for the next minute!
end_text: Miners no longer operating 20% more efficiently

name: Data Rush
description: A Data Rush is happening! All miners are supercharged for the next 60 minutes!

name: Encryption Breakthrough
description: Breakthrough in encryption! All miners are cheaper for a short period

name: Hack Attack
description: We're being hacked! Miners are less efficient than usual!
end_text: We've found the hacker, miner efficiency returned to normal

name: Market Fluctuation
description: A group of people on reddit are interfering with stock prices. Miners cost more than usual.
